attributes.action: Force Travel Agents to respond to their Customers Request for Holiday Confirmation and make this a Statutory Right and Legal Obligation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is requested as I personally have received no responses from my Travel Agent when enquiring about the status, confirmation and available as booked questions. Then within days of due to go on Holiday the Travel Agent informs me my Holiday itinerary had changed some months ago, while during that time I had been asking for confirmation they had said all was OK, and they had checked with the Tour Operator but frankly they had not and they had lied and misled me.
